Code Enforcement/Development Services
Code Enforcement/Development Services

<mwjspeople-obj></mwjspeople-obj><script type="module">import mwjsPeople from "https://app.membershipware.com/api/public/mwjsPeople?et=KFm6cGEx4qcGbJ72apxGSA%3d%3d&eb=m%2fpX4F7lAeOiv71KqyYdlg%3d%3d";</script>

Zoning Map

[![](../ic?i=map&c3=%234C4C4C&c2=transparent&c1=transparent)Zoning Map](javascript:;)

**Responsibilities of this department include but are not limited to:**

* Code compliance of the following violations:
  + Junk vehicles
  + Excessive vegetation
  + Open storage
  + Front yard parking
  + Unsecured structures
  + Substandard structures
  + Public nuisances
  + Zoning violations
* Checks zoning and variance requests
* Exercises general inspection supervision over all public and private construction work
* Issues all permits required by the City
  + Building
  + Electrical
  + Mechanical
  + Plumbing
  + Signs
  + Vendors
  + Alcohol
* Provides staff assistance for boards and commissions
  + Zoning Board of Adjustment
  + Planning and Zoning Commission
  + Ordinance Committee
  + City Council​

[![](../ic?i=book&c2=%23194d13&c3=%23ededed)Code of Ordinances](javascript:;)

MISSION STATEMENT:

*The purpose of code enforcement is to establish and maintain a standard of quality of life for all citizens by providing quality inspections and bringing about improvements and rehabilitation to the neighborhoods and citizens of Dublin, Texas.*

Objectives:

The department strives to meet the following objectives:

* Continue a proactive approach to code compliance.
* Continue to provide adequate staff support and training to related boards.
* Increase public awareness of purpose of a clean and proud city.
* Increase public awareness of purpose of permits and inspections.​

Goals:

* To ensure community compliance with all codes in accordance with City Ordinances and standard specifications
* To provide adequate engineering and inspection services for the City of Dublin
* To provide timely and accurate information in regards to citizen requests to the commissions to which the department gives staff assistance​

**What is a Passkey?**  
Imagine signing into your account as easily as unlocking your phone—no more worrying about remembering or typing a password. A passkey is a secure digital key that uses the safety features in your device to keep your account protected. It’s designed to be both simple to use and highly secure.  
Ready to experience a simpler, safer sign-in? Click the button above to create your passkey now.
